letters.description: Establish a safe, grounded psychological container and regulated state to prepare for creative expression.
Engage the subconscious through sensory-based art prompts designed to bypass cognitive resistance.
Explore the formal elements and symbolic imagery within the work to identify emerging emotional patterns.
Facilitate a dialogue between the creator and the creation to externalize and witness internal narratives.
Connect symbolic breakthroughs to the client's current life challenges and specific therapeutic goals.
Translate creative insights into sustainable cognitive reframing and actionable behavioral changes.
